channel.title: Prayers
channel.description: Hello all I want to remove new prayer interface from my bluurr client. I got this prayer tab and i want the basic one what i need to do?? [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2cgkod4.jpg[/img] Tried to delete it from class 9 but it wont let me login to check it.. Maybe anyone could help me??? Maybe anyone has basic prayer interfaces codes???

item.title: Prayers
item.dc:creator: @570fd 570fd
item.description:
@570fd wrote:

Echo_:

For the image itself, you will have to edit the prayer sprites in your client cache using Tom’s cache suite. After that you will have to remove the prayers and their functions server sided, but I have no clue how to do that.

Dude in chase theyre normal/defaults

Read full topic

item.title: Prayers

item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

For the image itself, you will have to edit the prayer sprites in your client cache using Tom’s cache suite. After that you will have to remove the prayers and their functions server sided, but I have no clue how to do that.
